title: Z-Railed
description: Follow family man, Franklin Moore, as the un-dead apocalypse hits central Kentucky wreaking havoc in its path as he struggles to survive. Watch as he navigates the unfamiliar territory of the new world, trying to hold onto the last vestiges of civilization all the while striving to protect his family. Join him as he endures heartache, loss, betrayal, and revenge! Won't believe what happens!
author: Joshua Holcomb
